notFound.title: Page could not be found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're after! Try starting again from the homepage.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.description: This page has thrown a non-recoverable error.

Index.meta_description: Activpass is a platform that connects people with sports and fitness activities in their local area.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

ForgotPassword.meta_description: Forgot your password? No worries! Easily reset it through our password recovery process.

ResetPassword.meta_description: Reset your password securely and conveniently with our password reset feature.
ResetPassword.title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.description: Enter your new password below to reset your account password.
ResetPassword.success_message: Password reset successfully, redirecting to login page...
